text: Hans Sommer may refer to: *Hans Sommer (composer) (1837–1922), opera composer * (1904–2000), film music composer for Der Mann, der Sherlock Holmes war and other films *Hans Sommer (cyclist) (1924-2004), Swiss cyclist *Hans Sommer (SS officer), SS officer who dynamited the synagogues of Paris, later Cold War spy
title: Hans Sommer
